bug.author: monchier
bug.summary: Connection error message reports the wrong command line when running from url
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>How to repro:</denchmark-h>
Run a script from url. For example:
<denchmark-code>streamlit run https://github.com/streamlit/demo-self-driving/blob/master/app.py </denchmark-code>
Interrupt the script and look at the UI Wait until the Connection Error message shows up (30 sec or less)
<denchmark-h:h1>What should happens</denchmark-h>
The command line reported on the error message reflects the url we have run the script from <denchmark-h:h1>What happens</denchmark-h>
We show the temporary file in the error message
